author: Aric Sleeper
title: Westside’s Cruz Foam launches new eco-friendly packaging products
description: Cruz Foam, with facilities on the Westside of Santa Cruz, has recently launched two new packaging products, made in part from the shells of sea creatures such as shrimp, to keep products such as cold brews cool and wine bottles intact while they ship out to customers. Local companies Verve Coffee and Real Good Fish are early adopters of the eco-friendly packaging products.

author: Paula Tran
title: Banff’s new single-use waste reduction bylaw to take effect Saturday
description: Starting Saturday, the bylaw will require businesses like coffee shops and restaurants to serve food and drinks without disposable accessories (straws, utensils, cup lids, etc.).

author: Kate Ng
title: The high street iced coffees that have the most sugar revealed
description: The worst offender contains 48.5g of sugar, compared to a can of Coca-Cola’s 35g of sugar

author: Ruth Kamau
title: Girl Buys Coffee And A Bagel For Homeless Man, Then He Hands Her A Crumpled Note
description: He strolled into the coffee shop, unaware that Cary was watching him. She watched him counting his change and decided to talk to him.

author: Josie Clarke
title: High street iced coffees can contain more sugar than Coca-Cola, Which? finds
description: Which? compared frappes and frappuccinos from Caffe Nero, Costa and Starbucks and found many had ‘exceptionally high’ amounts of sugar.

author: Ruchika M
title: Coffee after tooth extraction: Is it safe, and what you need to know?
description: Coffee after tooth extraction: Is it safe, and what you need to know?

author: Miriam Schwartz
title: Home Showcase: Sun and fun in Sandwich
description: Let’s be real. When you picture your ideal Cape getaway, it’s not “a short drive to the beach” or “moments from the beach.” You want to be able to venture out with your morning coffee and touch sand. With 349 Phillips Road in Sandwich, you get just that. It’s idyllic coastal living, right on Sagamore […]

author: Fermin Koop
title: That morning coffee we all crave might actually be just a placebo
description: A new study suggests that the energy boosting effects of coffee may be all in your head.

author: Gareth Richman
title: Britain’s Number 1 tennis player Cameron Norrie’s Favourite Things
description: We caught up with the tennis star to talk about his sporting heroes, tattoos, off-court style, London and good coffee

author: Tammy LaGorce
title: A Bond Built Over Coffee Leads to Success in Love and Business
description: Sahra Nguyen and Erics Kun’s connection grew slowly during early morning meetups at Brooklyn cafes. Now, they are partners in life and at Nguyen Coffee Supply, founded by Ms. Nguyen.

author: Prudence Wade
title: Rhubarb sticky buns for an idyllic Scandinavian afternoon tea
description: Eat these buns from Trine Hahnemann’s new cookbook straight out of the oven with a coffee for afternoon tea, says Prudence Wade

author: Amira Arasteh
title: Best coffee machine deals for Amazon Prime Day 2023: Early savings on Nespresso, Lavazza and more
description: Get your caffeine fix for less with these early Amazon Prime Day deals
